name: Cat-like Shopping Detected
description:
Be a cat and hit bubbles. Don't accidentally buy stuff, your owner won't like it.

NOTE: This game requires 2 controllers to play.

Controls
  • Left Stick - Move cursor
  • A - Hit stuff
  • Back - Quit
  • F4 - Fullscreen
What's new in 1.1
  • Reduced time limit to 1 minute.
  • "Buy now!" buttons now scroll upwards instead of to the left.
